description: Beautyberry (Callicarpa Americana) is a stunning deciduous shrub that's native to the southeastern United States. Its amazing, billowing clumps of lilac-purple berries and delicate foliage make it a year-round treat for the eyes. The berries have a tart flavor that is popular for making jellies and jams. Plus, Beautyberry is an excellent choice for wildlife gardens as its fruits are a favorite among birds, such as blue jays, quail, and cardinals. The blooms of this shrub are also a vital source of nectar for butterflies and bees. It's a great addition to any garden and will grace it with its beauty all year round.
